mapper.select: SELECT item_code, item_name, standard, material, specification_file, draw_file, mc_name, sc_name FROM item LEFT JOIN sub_category USING(sc_code) LEFT JOIN major_category USING(mc_code) ORDER BY item_registration_date desc

SELECT contract_name, product_name, item_code, item_name, subcontractor_name, agreement_date, leadtime FROM contract LEFT JOIN item USING(item_code) LEFT JOIN item_has_product USING(item_code) ORDER BY agreement_date desc

SELECT item_code, item_name, process, production_date, consumption FROM item LEFT JOIN item_has_product USING(item_code) LEFT JOIN products_production_plan USING(product_name) LEFT JOIN item_use_plan USING(item_code) ORDER BY item_registration_date desc
